page.title: 11 A Childs View
page.content: In Grafton Underwood there are not many children. Primary aged children go mainly to Cranford School, but one boy aged 11 attended Geddington School. He has lived in Grafton Underwood for one year and finds it very peaceful. He comes to school by car. His favourite subject is art. At school he had just done some writing about a cricket match (2nd July 1985). He likes reading comics and magazines and enjoys pop music. At home he has his own computer. He has one brother who he says he doesn't like. In September he is going to Bishop Stopford Secondary School in Kettering.
